story:
Back in 2010, I resigned from my job and returned to university to pursue my dream of finishing my degree. While attending university, I thought that I could be a volunteer teacher in my spare time. I searched the internet for a volunteer teaching assignment that would suit me. My thought was that I could teach art – drawing, painting and that sort of thing.

I came across 4dekdoi.com. I checked them out and learned that they were a charity organization aimed at helping hill tribe children at Aomkoi District, Chiangmai Mai Province, Thailand. I liked the idea of working with hill tribe children and visiting that part of my homeland. After verifying that they were a reputable group, I expressed my interest and volunteered to lend a hand.

While introducing myself to the group on their webpage, I met Khun Bes. He's from Northern Thailand and is fully involved in charity and volunteer work. He spends his whole year working with the group.  Either raising funds or traveling to the tribal areas and working with the children and locals to implement projects of various sorts – building and rebuilding schools, setting up generators for electricity, installing teachers for various villages, etc.

He asked if I would like to join his group and journey out to the hills with them. I said “yes!” and never looked back.

That's where's the story begins. We maintain contact via Facebook. We design and make T-Shirt for sale to raise funds. We organize over the internet and then meet in various places in Thailand and head up north three or four times a year.

The first project that I joined, we re-furbished the classroom and library. We also installed a new outside latrine and shower.  We brought medical treatment for the children. Each time we go, we feed the children three meals a day. This might be the only time of the year that these children eat this well. We collected clothing, books and toys to give to the children. We also play educational games.

All the while, we camp out in tents spending all of our time on site immersed in nature. We have to stay on site as it’s an 8 to 12 hour journey to each village and we stay five to six days each time.

On the first trip, we traveled to Salate School in Amkoi, Chiangmai. It was a great success. We had enough money for food and activities AND to build them two toilets. Yeah!

I still remember the day that we arrived. My friends and I arrived at the meeting point. We met the other volunteers who would make the journey with us from Bangkok to Chiangmai. We all came from different parts of the country. It was a great feeling to come together to do something good for people who were less fortunate than we. We loaded up and prepared everything for the journey and headed out for Aomkoi! However, the school was not in the central district. When we arrived in Chiangmai, we had to change vehicles. We needed 4WDs to get into the tribal areas. Amkoi is far into the hill tribe area. The roads are mostly mud trails through mountain passes and
over ridgelines. Up the hills…down the hills…and back up again…until finally we arrived 10 hours later at our destination. It was a rough ride.

It was great experience. The roads were mostly muddy or partially concrete but all around us was lush greenery -- the forests and jungles of Northern Thailand. We were surrounded by nature. The air was crisp and fresh. The atmosphere was peaceful and wonderful. I was so happy that I burst into tears. I was proud to have made the journey and to be in that place doing some small part to help others. I believe that all of my friends that would join in this endeavor would have that same good and wholesome feeling. It’s a fairly serious trip up to the hill tribes. One wrong turn or a slip could send us off the side of the mountain to certain doom. You need
skilled and experienced drivers. The hills are very steep. The roads are, for the most part, horrendous. When you arrive, though, it’s worth every risk and every bruised body part.

At journey’s end, I saw a tiny roof through the forest canopy. I screamed; “Yes, we’re here.” I was a little excited. We reached the school. The villagers all came out to greet us. They helped us carry all of our cargo and bags and tents and such. The children…the children…they stood around us smiling beatifically. They were happy and shy and beautiful smiles and, oh so cute. They were simply precious.

We spent the next six days and five nights teaching the kids, playing games with them, building outhouses and installing plumbing, feeding the children and generally having a wonderful time. It was a much more blessed experience than I had expected. I was grateful to those children in that village. They had showed me the joys of helping others. For certain, it was a challenge. It was worth every second, every dollar or baht and every bruise and piece of paint in my hair.


We would like to raise enough money to help the next village school. 

We usually raise around 150,000bht (5,000USD).  We would like to raise that amount for our January trip to Northern Thailand. 

This will allow us to re-build a school, feed the children, rent vehicles to get out to the village and provide new clothes, school supplies and toys for the children.

The funding will go towards food and supplies.

We usually feed three meals a day for two to three villages full of children for a week (300 children and their families).

We rent local vehicles from around Chiangmai for a week to carry us and the supplies out to the village.  

We purchase a years worth of school supplies and deliver them to a village.  If we have more supplies than one village school will need, we take the remainder and give them out to other villages in the Hill Tribe Area.  Last year, we were able to help several schools in the area.

We purchase clothing, shoes and winter coats for the children as well.  We usually purchase clothing on the Thai-Burmese border.  We can obtain mass amounts of clothing from this area fairly cheaply.  We donate all of this clothing to the children and in some cases to the local adults.  On the border, we purchase "lots" full of children's clothing.  However, one never knows what will be in the mix.  Any adult clothing that we obtain, we hand out at the village.

Last year, we had enough left over clothing to pass out to several villages along our route.

We also hope to raise enough funds to employ a full time teacher and teaching assistant for this village for a year.

We will use all funds raised to help these children.  

I am donating all supplies and materials for the perks as the first donation.  

The perks for this handmade Jewelry from Wanderluster Dreams on Etsy.com.

http://www.etsy.com/shop/WanderlusterDreams?ref=shop_sugg

I have made a few special project related items for donation perks -- two bracelets (500USD) and one neckband (1,000USD).


The Impact

We aim to help those less fortunate than us.  Some of the folks who join us are barely able to do so.  They volunteer their time as they earn about 15 to 25,000bht (500 to 800USD) per month.  Others contribute funds or supplies for us to use or give to the village and school.

Most of Northern Thailand is rural and poverty stricken.  These children are malnourished, barely clothed and make due with the barest of learning facilities.  Most schools do not have a full time teacher.  These children are behind the global power curve. 

We aim to catch them up.  It may be a small step each time.  However, each time we travel to a village, we expose them to the world beyond their vision, beyond their knowledge.  We open the the way for imagination, new vision and new possibilities.  We hope to help them to eventually help themselves by sharing with them love, fidelity and a vista on the world to which they may otherwise never be exposed.

To illustrate, my boyfriend traveled with us on one trip thus far.  He was the only non-Thai person and the only non-Thai person whom most folks in this non-tourist area had experienced.  They were fascinated by the differences between themselves and him.  We used his presence to help teach about and explain the greater world.  Most of these children will never leave their tribal areas much less Northern Thailand.  However, we wish to show them that there are possibilities extant everywhere. 

In the meantime, we can help feed them.  We can help clothe them.  We can show them love.  We can open their minds to the world.

We hope you will find a way to help us do so.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

We realize that not everyone has the disposable income to help financially.  That's not a problem.  If you can send clothing, school supplies (pens, pencils, magic markers, note books, etc), we can use it to help these children.  If you have old English language primers, we'll take them.  Anything that you think will help fill a void in these beautiful children's lives, we can get to them.

We appreciate and will share every form of assistance that you feel you can share with us.

If you have something to send, pls send it to the following address:


Urai Klangkongsap
11/158 Perfect Park
Ratpattana, Ladkrabang
Klongsontonnon
Bangkok  10520 Thailand

Every little bit helps...Unny

I searched the internet for a volunteer teaching assignment that would suit me. My thought was that I could teach art – drawing, painting and that sort of thing.
I came across 4dekdoi.com. I checked them out and learned that they were a charity organization aimed at helping hill tribe children at Aomkoi District, Chiangmai Mai Province, Thailand. I liked the idea of working with hill tribe children and visiting that part of my homeland. After verifying that they were a reputable group, I expressed my interest and volunteered to lend a hand. 
While introducing myself to the group on their webpage, I met Khun Bes. He's from Northern Thailand and is fully involved in charity and volunteer work. He spends his whole year working with the group.  Either raising funds or traveling to the tribal areas and working with the children and locals to implement projects of various sorts – building and rebuilding schools, setting up generators for electricity, installing teachers for various villages, etc. He asked if I would like to join his group and journey out to the hills with them. I said “yes!” and never looked back. 
That's where's the story begins. We maintain contact via Facebook. We design and make T-Shirt for sale to raise funds. We organize over the internet and then meet in various places in Thailand and head up north three or four times a year. 
The first project that I joined, we re-furbished the classroom and library. We also installed a new outside latrine and shower.  We brought medical treatment for the children. Each time we go, we feed the children three meals a day. This might be the only time of the year that these children eat this well. We collected clothing, books and toys to give to the children. We also play educational games. 
All the while, we camp out in tents spending all of our time on site immersed in nature. We have to stay on site as it’s an 8 to 12 hour journey to each village and we stay five to six days each time. 
On the first trip, we traveled to Salate School in Amkoi, Chiangmai. It was a great success. We had enough money for food and activities AND to build them two toilets. Yeah!I still remember the day that we arrived. My friends and I arrived at the meeting point. We met the other volunteers who would make the journey with us from Bangkok to Chiangmai. We all came from different parts of the country. It was a great feeling to come together to do something good for people who were less fortunate than we. We loaded up and prepared everything for the journey and headed out for Aomkoi! However, the school was not in the central district. When we arrived in Chiangmai, we had to change vehicles. We needed 4WDs to get into the tribal areas. Amkoi is far into the hill tribe area. The roads are mostly mud trails through mountain passes andover ridgelines. Up the hills…down the hills…and back up again…until finally we arrived 10 hours later at our destination. It was a rough ride.It was great experience. The roads were mostly muddy or partially concrete but all around us was lush greenery -- the forests and jungles of Northern Thailand. We were surrounded by nature. The air was crisp and fresh. The atmosphere was peaceful and wonderful. I was so happy that I burst into tears. I was proud to have made the journey and to be in that place doing some small part to help others. I believe that all of my friends that would join in this endeavor would have that same good and wholesome feeling. It’s a fairly serious trip up to the hill tribes. One wrong turn or a slip could send us off the side of the mountain to certain doom. You needskilled and experienced drivers. The hills are very steep. The roads are, for the most part, horrendous. When you arrive, though, it’s worth every risk and every bruised body part.
At journey’s end, I saw a tiny roof through the forest canopy. I screamed; “Yes, we’re here.” I was a little excited. We reached the school. The villagers all came out to greet us. They helped us carry all of our cargo and bags and tents and such. The children…the children…they stood around us smiling beatifically. They were happy and shy and beautiful smiles and, oh so cute. They were simply precious. 
We spent the next six days and five nights teaching the kids, playing games with them, building outhouses and installing plumbing, feeding the children and generally having a wonderful time. It was a much more blessed experience than I had expected. I was grateful to those children in that village. They had showed me the joys of helping others. For certain, it was a challenge. It was worth every second, every dollar or baht and every bruise and piece of paint in my hair. 

We would like to raise enough money to help the next village school. 
We usually raise around 150,000bht (5,000USD).  We would like to raise that amount for our January trip to Northern Thailand.  
This will allow us to re-build a school, feed the children, rent vehicles to get out to the village and provide new clothes, school supplies and toys for the children.
The funding will go towards food and supplies.We usually feed three meals a day for two to three villages full of children for a week (300 children and their families).
We rent local vehicles from around Chiangmai for a week to carry us and the supplies out to the village.  
We purchase a years worth of school supplies and deliver them to a village.  If we have more supplies than one village school will need, we take the remainder and give them out to other villages in the Hill Tribe Area.  Last year, we were able to help several schools in the area.
We purchase clothing, shoes and winter coats for the children as well.  We usually purchase clothing on the Thai-Burmese border.  We can obtain mass amounts of clothing from this area fairly cheaply.  We donate all of this clothing to the children and in some cases to the local adults.  On the border, we purchase "lots" full of children's clothing.  However, one never knows what will be in the mix.  Any adult clothing that we obtain, we hand out at the village.Last year, we had enough left over clothing to pass out to several villages along our route.
We also hope to raise enough funds to employ a full time teacher and teaching assistant for this village for a year.
We will use all funds raised to help these children.  I am donating all supplies and materials for the perks as the first donation.  
The perks for this handmade Jewelry from Wanderluster Dreams on Etsy.com.
http://www.etsy.com/shop/WanderlusterDreams?ref=shop_suggI have made a few special project related items for donation perks -- two bracelets (500USD) and one neckband (1,000USD).The ImpactWe aim to help those less fortunate than us.  Some of the folks who join us are barely able to do so.  They volunteer their time as they earn about 15 to 25,000bht (500 to 800USD) per month.  Others contribute funds or supplies for us to use or give to the village and school.Most of Northern Thailand is rural and poverty stricken.  These children are malnourished, barely clothed and make due with the barest of learning facilities.  Most schools do not have a full time teacher.  These children are behind the global power curve.  We aim to catch them up.  It may be a small step each time.  However, each time we travel to a village, we expose them to the world beyond their vision, beyond their knowledge.  We open the the way for imagination, new vision and new possibilities.  We hope to help them to eventually help themselves by sharing with them love, fidelity and a vista on the world to which they may otherwise never be exposed.To illustrate, my boyfriend traveled with us on one trip thus far.  He was the only non-Thai person and the only non-Thai person whom most folks in this non-tourist area had experienced.  They were fascinated by the differences between themselves and him.  We used his presence to help teach about and explain the greater world.  Most of these children will never leave their tribal areas much less Northern Thailand.  However, we wish to show them that there are possibilities extant everywhere.  In the meantime, we can help feed them.  We can help clothe them.  We can show them love.  We can open their minds to the world.We hope you will find a way to help us do so. Other Ways You Can HelpWe realize that not everyone has the disposable income to help financially.  That's not a problem.  If you can send clothing, school supplies (pens, pencils, magic markers, note books, etc), we can use it to help these children.  If you have old English language primers, we'll take them.  Anything that you think will help fill a void in these beautiful children's lives, we can get to them.We appreciate and will share every form of assistance that you feel you can share with us.If you have something to send, pls send it to the following address:Urai Klangkongsap11/158 Perfect ParkRatpattana, LadkrabangKlongsontonnonBangkok  10520 ThailandEvery little bit helps...Unny

story:
Entering the Ark

Dear friends,

I never thought I would be asking for your help in this manner and it's really a stretch for me to do this. The main Goal for this Campaign  truly, is not to stay in this particular home, for my life partner Marion and I are glad to go wherever God leads us, and in this case God has lead us to you. Our main Goal is to fulfill the Special Function we've been Given  and to Listen, Learn and Do.

A few years back I heard the Calling to move from Ontario to British Columbia with nothing but 2 bags of clothes and a few bucks in my bank account. I had no plans, nowhere to go past the first few days and a few supportive friends to welcome me here. Deep in my heart I knew I am sustained only by the Love of God and that I had always live by Divine Providence alone. As close friends can attest, the hardest part was to move away from my young daughter, who I love dearly, Yet if I truly believed that God is always taking care of me, it would also had to be true that God would always take care of her as well. This was my biggest test of Faith. 

About a year later Marion and I met, united by those same principals, the same Calling, and our genuine Love for Truth. A year after we met, Marion left a successful career as a Physio in Germany and just as I was asked to do, Marion also had to entrust her only son Joshua, into the care of his other parent and both in the hands of God. 

Being offered this place we call our Home a week after Marion first came to visit 3 years ago was only, one in a seemingly endless string of Miracles we've been showered with. Means, supplies and mighty companions have shown up in ways that are nothing but miraculous, and others have also found safe refuge here. In this slice of Heaven we call our Home where everyone is welcome.      


Radical Trust & Our Only Purpose

Marion and I do remember well hat we do not know what this is for. What we do know is that God is with us everywhere we go, and that we are happy to be wherever He would have us be, Our deep desire to learn and live in Radical Trust had not only brought us together and to you, but it had also take us to better and brighter places in the world time and time again, A sure reflection of a greater awareness of the Love of God within.

So, how come are we asking for your help today?

Well, if we are meant to move on we will move on. That is clear. And we will do so in the same Spirit of Reverence, Gratitude and Humility in which we have lived every single day for the last 3 years. And in the same way as we intend to live each and every instant for the rest of our lives.

If this is so, where is the problem you may ask?

Well of course there is no problem! Yet, we've also been Graced with a Vision for this place. And this Gift and Responsibility was received before we even knew this place existed and came to live here, A Vision we intend to honor in every way we possibly can and are lead to. In our false humility we never dared to believe we would be entrusted to hold the space for a Sanctuary to be built on this grounds,. Thank God we were wrong! This Sanctuary will serve to honor All Life, Our Purpose and Calling is to laid down our God given Life and dedicate it to be of Service for the Healing of Children, Wildlife, Flowers and Herbs. As we have been directed. In our Hearts, Marion and I we feel that to Heal is to Serve and to see another's best interest the same as our own. 

We are keenly aware that, whether we recognize it or not, we ALL live our lives by Divine Providence and nothing else. Therefore, in the same way as this home away from home has been freely given to us, we intend to freely offer it to all others. We've already been doing that, on a small scale. The Model is that of a Hospice as it was Originally intended, a place for travelers to find Healing and Rest on their Path. Hopefully this Sanctuary/Hospice will bring them Home as well through Forgiveness. That's not in our hands, what is in our hands is to be willing. And willing we certainly are!

There is also huge potential to develop a "business branch" that will help us offer free access to more people. As well as to expand by building simple structures to accommodate visitors along the coastline adjacent to our kilometer long driveway.


How can you help us help?

We have been brought now to the point where our landlady can't continue to wait for her rent to be paid. She had been miraculously patient with us while we've done our best with what's been given. We live in a gorgeous ocean~side cottage in the rainforest, We have now asked us to paid our arrears by the 20th of this months, or leave. That's 2 days away!

Things being the way they are, I learned  that some monies I was promised to receive yesterday to at least cover our rent, will not be coming for at least another 4 to 6 weeks. That means that by the end of the month Marion and I will have to leave this place. And we have no money coming, no other resources in sight and no place to go. This have all the markings of another Miracle, We just don't know what that Miracle is going to look like, for us to reach out to you in this way, which is huge for us, is the first Miracle.

We know is in your Heart to give, for we are not different at all. Whatever amount you can afford if any, to help us in our Vision to bring real and permanent Healing into this weary world, and share what we have so abundantly received with whoever ask for it, will be honored an appreciated in ways we have no words to express.

We understand that a Donation through Pay Pal would be made available to us quicker than one made by Credit Card. This emergency situation has left us with no time to look into how this system works. We are just doing what we are told.

In exchange we offer you our unconditional gratitude, that is, we are grateful to you whether you donate or not. Our place is always open to receive whoever is in need of Healing and Rest. If you want a spot to be named after you or a loved one, will find a way to do that. If you wish to include yourself or a loved one in our prayers and distance healing practices, which has Forgiveness of Self as our only focus, we'll be glad to do that as well.

We can offer more details on this project and on future developments by contacting Marion or myself on Facebook


via email @ 1inner.guru@gmail.com

or by phone @ 1 250 642 1419. 

Your monetary donations and your prayers are greatly appreciated. 

Salvation is a Collaborative Venture. Please remember we love you unconditionally.

Thank you!

story:
Who are we?

The Travel Club is a travel community, an internet magazine about geoculture and a database of knowledge on independent travel. We see traveling as a tool for building a culture of solidarity and understanding; an instrument for developing mental attitude and sensibility; a key to gaining an intimate understanding of our common planet and creating personal bonds with the world; a means to fight against prejudice, human stupidity and hatred, against borders around us and within us. 

The Travel Club was started in 2005. In the meantime we've published a book of travel stories (crowdfunded, 17 authors), carried out a number of expeditions, lectures, talks and photo exhibitions, and organized two Travel Houses.

What is a Travel House?

We go to a country and rent a house to serve as a temporary travel base for exploring the region. Staying in the house is free for everyone, and some basic necessities are also provided – such as detergent, soap, toilet paper, cooking oil, flour etc. The goal of the Travel House project is to provide a global meeting point for independent travelers, and thus be a small step towards building a global travel culture – a culture of solidarity and understanding of this planet we all share together.

In 2012 the Travel House was in Istanbul, Turkey, and in 2013 in Granada, Spain. The two Houses we organized so far were visited by a total of 443 travelers from 51 countries.

Where is it gonna be?

This year it is going to be in Tbilisi, the capital of Georgia, a country situated between the Black and the Caspian Sea.

When?

The Travel House will be open and is looking forward to having you in July and August 2014.

What do we need the money for?

Renting an apartment in a foreign city is not easy; landlords are often suspicious of foreigners – especially if there are 30 of them staying there at any given time. Furthermore, it's not easy to rent for 2 months only – the price automatically goes up. Also, we are all travelers, often on long journeys, which means the washing machine is on 24/7 and there is a queue for the shower – the bills are huge.

We'd like to rent a big apartment/house, preferably with a back yard (for hanging out and pitching tents), a balcony and an extra toilet. We'll also provide cooking oil, flower, toilet paper, soap, detergents and other basic necessities.

If we collect enough, we'd like to partly cover the travel expenses of those who will go there to find and apartment, set up the place and make sure everything is running smoothly. 

The breakdown of all the costs of previous Travel Houses is available on our website: Istanbul and Granada.

Can I use the Travel House if I don't donate?

Donation is not necessary for staying in the House; also, a lot of people who donated for the previous Houses didn't actually go there – they did it to support the idea.

Can this project grow?

Upon the completion of the first Travel House, we have published an article with a detailed explanation of how it functions. We have inherited the idea of a Russia-based organization called the Academy of Free Travels, and then changed it a bit according to our needs. We would like other individuals and organizations to adopt this idea from us and improve it. 

We envision a world in which there are a number of houses where travelers can have their temporary home – where they can sleep, eat, make friends, organize workshops, share skills, and exchange stories and ideas – without having to pay for anything.

Perks

We are offering lovely, travel-related perks made by our artists. Here are some examples.

So, help us and start packing! See you in Tbilisi!

story:
Supporting community-based sea turtle conservation in Maio island

BACKGROUND

Cape Verde has the third largest loggerhead sea turtle (Caretta caretta) population in the world. Within the archipelago, Maio Island has one of the three most important nesting sites for this endangered species. In 2012 the island had the highest rates of killed females and poached nests in the country. Human predation is considered as one of the major threats.

FMB

Maio Biodiversity Foundation (FMB) is a local NGO founded in 2010 in Maio, Cape Verde. Our mission is to preserve fauna and flora in Maio and create opportunities and long-term benefits for its people. The sea turtle conservation project is one of FMB’s main programs, given the important role of the sea turtles not only in the marine ecosystem but also in the local culture and as natural heritage.

SUCCESS THROUGH COMMUNITY-BASED APPROACH

In the 2013 sea turtle nesting season, FMB tried a new conservation strategy in Maio. Turtle protection teams were placed in 8 coastal villages around the island and team members were hosted by local families. Their main job was to patrol turtle nesting beaches. The presence of the teams in each village was critical to raising awareness about importance and threats to sea turtles. We also created needed job opportunities for the community members, as a guard or host family. The combination of practical education, direct protection and turtle friendly source of income proofed to be effective and resulted in a reduction of 75% in the mortality of female turtles in only one season! 

Take part in the 2014 campaign by providing urgently needed funding to protect turtles in Maio!

THE AIM of the PROJECT

In 2014, FMB aims to continue its community-based turtle conservation project and expand the protection work to all villages around Maio. Actively protecting the beaches is an important interim measure, while education, awareness and respect are the long term solution for sea turtle conservation on the island. Reinforced by direct benefits for the local communities it can produce successful and cost-effective results.

Your support is needed to continue and expand this important work. 

With this campaign we are aiming to fund the protection work and educational activites in the village of Alcatraz.

By donating for the ALCATRAZ TEAM you help to finance:

The salary for 1 guard

Salary and homestay for 1 team leader

Salary for one host family

and the Children for Nature Campaign 
(see perks)


Benefits you get in return:

The first 7 donors will receive a team t-shirt in mid June, when we start the season

The first donor over 100 Euros can name the team

The first donor over 150 Euros can choose a theme for Children For Nature Campaign

             

               


ALCATRAZ village opens up to the Mountain Penoso - the highest peak of Maio island. The local community is very friendly and open to new initiatives. Alcatraz is famous for its own Batuku,the traditional women music group and has one of the lowest rates of nest poaching on the island. The Children for Nature Campaign will be held here to show the importance of children in achieving a sustainable future for the island, country and the planet.



THE WORK of the TEAMS

Teams actively patrol turtle nesting beaches at night to make sure that nesting females safely return to the sea after the eggs are deposited in the nest. The team collects biological information and tags turtles to monitor their movements and success of survival. Our teams also help turtles to camouflage the nests to prevent egg poaching by unfriendly visitors. Early in the morning the team analyses events of the night and prepares for the next patrol session. During the day educational activities take place in host villages. Local people are invited to join night patrols and learn about turtle life on land and the sea and spread.


Please help us spread the word for our campaign to support the village of Alcatraz to save its turtles!!!

COMMUNITY-BASED APPROACH 
In the 2013
sea turtle nesting season, FMB tried a new conservation strategy in Maio.
Turtle protection teams were placed in 8 coastal villages around the island and
team members were hosted by local families. Their main job was to patrol turtle
nesting beaches. The presence of the teams in each village was critical to
raising awareness about importance and threats to sea turtles. We also created
needed job opportunities for the community members, as a guard or host family.
The combination of practical education, direct protection and turtle friendly
source of income proofed to be effective and resulted in a reduction of 75%
in the mortality of female turtles in only one season! Take part in the 2014 campaign by providing urgently needed funding to
protect turtles in Maio!THE AIM of the PROJECTIn 2014, FMB aims to continue its community-based turtle conservation project and expand the protection work to all villages around Maio. Actively protecting the beaches is an important interim measure, while education, awareness and respect are the long term solution for sea turtle conservation on the island. Reinforced by direct benefits for the local communities it can produce successful and cost-effective results.Your support
is needed to continue and expand this important work. With this campaign we are aiming to fund the protection work and educational activites in the village of Alcatraz.By donating for the ALCATRAZ TEAM you help to finance:
The salary for 1 guard
Salary and homestay for 1
team leader Salary for one host familyand the Children for Nature Campaign (see perks)Benefits you get in return:
The first 7 donors will receive a team t-shirt in mid June, when we start the seasonThe first donor over 100 Euros can name the team 
The first donor over 150 Euros can choose a theme for Children
For Nature Campaign                            ALCATRAZ village opens up to the Mountain Penoso - the highest peak of Maio
island. The local community is very friendly and open to new initiatives.
Alcatraz is famous for its own Batuku,the traditional women music group and has
one of the lowest rates of nest poaching on the island. The Children for Nature
Campaign will be held here to show the importance of children in achieving a
sustainable future for the island, country and the planet.THE WORK of the TEAMS 
Teams actively patrol turtle nesting beaches
at night to make sure that nesting females safely return to the sea after the
eggs are deposited in the nest. The team collects biological information and
tags turtles to monitor their movements and success of survival. Our teams also
help turtles to camouflage the nests to prevent egg poaching by unfriendly
visitors. Early in the morning the team analyses events of the night and
prepares for the next patrol session. During the day educational activities
take place in host villages. Local people are invited to join night patrols and
learn about turtle life on land and the sea and spread.

Please help us spread the word for our campaign to support the village of Alcatraz to save its turtles!!!

story:
Chef 2.0 Reboot

Reboot is a program that I feel can return me to the one true calling in my life that I absolutely loved, and had to leave prematurely....

  • My Name is Peter Pizzati and I have been cooking all of my life.
  • Years and years of working under high stress conditions, long hours, and tireless deadlines and expectations caused me to have a "break down".
  • Diagnosed as having a "Post Traumatic Stress" type reaction to return to working in a professional kitchen.
  • My sole source of income now is a monthly disability cheque.
  • Reboot is a program that I feel can keep me involved in sharing, teaching and expressing my love of culinary arts through the internet and digital process.

Reboot is literally a second chance at a career I so loved.

Reboot Goals

How I foresee the initial phase 1 of Chef 2.0 Reboot

  • Our goal is to raise $3500, that may be a bit ambitious, but my goals can be re-prioritized to work within a number of ranges.
  • The donations will go to a set  number of capital purchases. Mainly to obtain and secure website hosting and website design software, and some hardware peripherals suitable to be able to print my own self published books and bindings.
  • Promotional materials and advertising campaigns to draw traffic to initial website.

The Impact

This campaign and the Reboot project is a way for me to return to the industry I love and dedicated myself to for so many years, in a way that I can still be a part of it, in a way that I can control and that is a viable healthy alternative to the real thing.

Other Ways You Can Help

I understand that not everyone can donate monetarily. However there are other ways that you can help, should you feel this to be a worthy campaign. You can help spread the word through your social media circles. Indiegogo has a number of share tools available, or you can visit my Reboot page at www.whattocookforsupper.com/Reboot.html

So that's it in a nutshell. Thank you for your time.

Sincerely

Peter V Pizzati

story:
Français   español


► What is DASHUB?

The Internet is becoming your desktop. How should you save your digital files ?  How can you hope to  keep track of all the many interesting people in social networks? Do you want to be notified when one of your sources talks about one of your favorite  topics? Do you need to centralize everything worth keeping in a single place? How can you easily retrieve  what you need just when you need it?

Up to now, there has been no single tool to help you store video clips found on YouTube and to merge them with interesting pictures found on Pinterest or with an article on a blog.  No one tool  to easily organize your emails, your .pdf files, and all your other online findings into dedicated folders.

Now DASHUB can do it!

DASHUB is a web application that can be connected to your web browser, mailbox, or Dropbox account. It works on your computer, on your tablet, and even on your smart phone.

  • You can save anything you want on the web (pages, video, tweets, Facebook posts, etc).
  • You can connect your mailbox and Dropbox and save  important files or emails to DASHUB.
  • You can organize  all of them by tags and by folders.
  • You can easily continuously monitor sources of information. The source can be specific users on Facebook, specific people  on Twitter, or specific web sites. Defined your topics, and be notified when someone is talking about them.






► Compatibility

DASHUB is fully responsive. It  can work on any device supporting the standard HTML of today. It works well on:
  • Chrome (Windows, MacOS, Linux, Android)
  • Firefox (Windows, MacOS, Linux)
  • Safari (MacOS, iOS)
  • Internet explorer 10 and above (windows)
DASHUB is compatible with mobile devices such as:
  • Android (tablet & smartphone)
  • iOS (iPad, iPhone)
  • Winfows 8 (Windows surface included).


► Testimonials

Johanna Viejo : director at Netoptic SA
«

What are the benefits of DASHUB for our design team?:

  • All our inspirations in any formats in a single place.
  • Easy, fast & efficient way to share dynamically our data, even remotely.
  • A look & feel allowing an analysis at first sight.
  • Very efficient technical support.
DASHUB is an ideal tool for a creative team. It allows us to archive our inspirations from any sources, to organize them, and to visualize them in a practical and efficient way. A real support for creativity.»

Laurent Munster : project Manager at Banque Privée Edmond de Rothschild Europe S.A.

« I have recently used DASHUB to group the information about a family trip to Guadeloupe. Thank to DASHUB, I had no need any more to print everything and to take it with me. I continually had at hand y my confirmation emails for our flights, the contacts for the villa renting, and the car renting, an access map, and also links to recommended excursions, restaurants, walks, and locations to visit. I even scanned our passports. No worries, with DASHUB, everything was organized through extremely simple tags accessible in a single click. »

Claudine Fraiture : general Director at North Atlantic Consult SA

  «  I'm 70 ans and I'm still active as a consultant; I inform myself on a daily basis on topics closed to my business. I gather my information from newspapers, blogs and different specialized web sites and through targeted notifications.
Some articles are worth keeping, I want to be able to read them on different occasions: what should I do?
Everything must be simple for me, really simple, fast and easy to index and to retrieve ; my laziness and my experience have been both seduced by DASHUB: a single click on the owl, a dialog box appears, simple and efficient. A single field to fill with the topics and its tags and it is done, I can move to something else !  »

Benjamin Damien : freelance Biotechnology Professional

« DASHUB helps me to keep track of the torrent of information I'm encountering every day in my favorite topics in science and economics, and to easily record and tag them with a simple right-click. It makes the tasks of documenting and participating in discussions a much easier achievement. »

Damien Soudant : project manager at JFX finance

« I need to document myself regularly on my sector and DASHUB allows me to store, organize, and filter all the documentation that I found with just two clicks. The tags system is very well thought out, the integration to my web browser is extremely practical, and it is quick to use. DASHUB is simple, user-friendly, and efficient! Wherever I am, I never lose my precious research, a significant saving in time. »


► Why do I need funds

So far I have funded DASHUB out of my savings. . The product is already fully developed. I need your help for the next steps:

  • Forming a company to start selling DASHUB.
  • Enhancing the mobile versions, creating apps that could be easily found on the different mobile markets for Apple iOS and Android..
  • Working with a UX designer to improve the user experience, so that DASHUB would look easier to use and probably prettier.
  • New languages, I would like to translate DASHUB into different languages so people all around the world could use it.

► What do You Get


Personal account $25

You can have a personal account for two years at half the price. You would really greatly help me. Thank you, your contribution is the backbone of the funding.  Nothing would be possible without your assistance!

  • 1 user
  • 6GB storage
  • 80 Feed imports
  • DAILY BACKUP


Contribute now


Business lifetime $100 [stock limited]

Do you have a small company.  Do you work  with the same partners? This plan  is for you:

  • 5 users
  • 15GB storage
  • 200 Feed imports
  • DAILY incremental BACKUP (Up to a full year)
  • Join the VIP R&D programme (see below)

Contribute now


Corporate lifetime $750 [stock limited]

Do you need resources to work in a single or different departments. Do you need to share content with partners or clients as well?

  • 100 users
  • 100GB storage
  • unlimited Feeds imports
  • DAILY incremental BACKUP Up to a full year
  • Online training
  • Join the VIP R&D programme (see below)

Contribute now


Gold lifetime $5000 [stock limited]

No worries, you do whatever you wish and we maintain the system for you. Focus on your business and we maintain the tools.

  • 100 users
  • 200GB storage
  • unlimited Feed imports
  • DAILY incremental BACKUP Up to a full year
  • Online training or a training held at your office*
  • Join the VIP R&D programme (see below)

* Budgetwise : flight and accommodations shouldn't exceed $1000 from our location


Contribute now


DASHUB Blade Server $11000 [stock limited]

The confidentiality is a real issue. Strong security policy wouldn't allow you to use SAAS solution. You need to have everything located in a safe environment under control. This plan is for you:

  • Unlimited users
  • Unlimited Feed Imports
  • RAID system
  • Instruction to quickly integrate the server into your network.
  • Linux Certified Hardware (Redhat)
  • OS: Ubuntu Server
  • Ask us for more details on the configuration.

Contribute now


VIP R&D programme

Do you want to influence this product? Do you want to give your input on its upcoming development? Vote for the best functionality? Push your own proposals? Test our prototypes? Give your opinion on the design, and the user experience? Welcome to our VIP program! We need a solid base for the next two years to come. Join us! Please note that a NDA will have to be signed in order to keep everything confidential.


► Competitive advantages

  • A single platform for all your needs: Curating,monitoring and sharing. You can find these functionalities but on different platforms. Simplify your life.
  • DASHUB is Web native, it embraces standards. it already allows amazing things such as interacting with 3D objects even on mobile devices. Get a solution for the years to come, don't fall into a technology lock-in.
  • Multi-user to the core. DASHUB has been first developed for the coporate world and adapted to the mass market afterwards. It is fully compatible with corporate policies. (users managements, rights management per folder, etc.)



► When do we deliver


FRENCH VERSION


Centraliser, organiser, diffuser très facilement tous vos contenus multimédia, pages web, liens sociaux, emails, documents depuis seul endroit dans le cloud.


► Qu'est ce que DASHUB?

Comment organiser votre vie digitale? Comment garder une trace des personnes intéressantes dans les réseaux sociaux? Etre notifié quand une de vos sources parle d'un sujet qui vous intéresse particulièrement? Centraliser tout ce qui est intéressant (email, liens, document, videos, images) dans une seule place? Les classer en un seul clic et les retrouver facilement quand vous en avez besoin?

DASHUB le fait.

DASHUB est une application web. Elle peut être connectée à votre navigateur web, à votre email ou à Dropbox. Elle fonctionne sur votre ordinateur, votre tablette ou votre smartphone.

  • Sauvez tout ce que vous voulez sur le web (pages, video clips, tweets, posts facebook, etc).
  • Connectez votre email, votre dropbox and sauvez y les emails ou fichiers importants.
  • Organisez le tout avec des tags et dans des dossiers.
  • Mettez en place des vieilles sur des sources d'information. Cette source peut être un ou des utilisateurs facebook ou twitter spécifiques, Ces sources peuvent être aussi des sites web. Définissez l'objet de la veille par l'intermédiaire de mots-clé et soyez notifié dès qu'ils l'abordent.


► Compatibilité

DASHUB est totalement "responsive". Ce qui veut dire qu'il peut fonctionner sur n'importe quel appareil respectant les standards HTML d'aujourd'hui. Pratiquement, ils fonctionnent sur:

  • Chrome (Windows, MacOS, Linux, Android);
  • Firefox (Windows, MacOS, Linux);
  • Safari( MacOS, iOS);
  • Internet explorer 10 et supérieur (windows).
DASHUB est compatible avec les appareils suivants
  • Android (tablette et smartphone)
  • iOS (iPad et iPhone)
  • Windows 8 (Surface y compris).


► Témoignages

Johanna Viejo : administratrice à Netoptic SA

«L’intérêt de DASHUB pour notre équipe de design :
  • Toutes nos inspirations, sur tous supports, dans un seul et même endroit.
  • Un partage de données, simple, rapide et efficace qui permet un échange dynamique même à distance.
  • Une mise en page qui permet une analyse en un coup doeil.
  • Un support d’une efficacité à toute épreuve.

Pour une équipe de créatifs, DASHUB est un outil idéal. Il nous permet d’archiver les inspirations de toutes sources, les organiser et les visualiser de façon pratique et efficace. Un vrai support à la créativité. »

Laurent Munster : project Manager à la Banque Privée Edmond de Rothschild Europe S.A.

« J'ai récemment utilisé DashHub pour regrouper toutes les informations rassemblées en vue d'un voyage en famille en Guadeloupe. Grâce à Dashhub, plus besoin de tout imprimer et tout amener avec soi, j'avais sous la main en permanence mes mails de confirmation pour nos vols, les contacts pour notre location de villa et voiture, les plans d'accès, mais aussi des liens vers des excursions recommandées, des restos et balades à faire, les sites à visiter. J'ai même scanné et rassemblé dans mon DASHUB la copie de mon permis de conduire et de mon passeport. Zéro tracas, avec DASHUB tout est classé via un système de Tags ultra simple et accessible en un clic. Et un soucis de moins afin de partir en vacances l'esprit libre . . .»

Claudine Fraiture : présidente de North Atlantic Consult SA

  « J’ai 70 ans et suis toujours active en tant que Consultant ; je m’informe journellement sur les sujets proches de mes affaires par la Presse , les blogs , différents sites spécialisés et via des notifications ciblées .
Certains articles , de qualité , valent la peine d’être archivés , je veux les consulter à d’autres occasions: que faire ?
Pour moi , cela doit être simple , très simple ,rapide , facile à indexer et à retrouver ; ma paresse et mon expérience ont été toutes les deux séduites par DASHUB : un clic sur le Hibou , j’ai une « dialog box » , bien présentée et claire , une case à remplir avec le sujet et sa classification et c’est fini , je passe à autres chose ! »

Benjamin Damien: consultant scientifique en Biotechnologie

« DASHUB me permet de garder traces de mes sujets favoris en science et en économie dans ce torrent d'information. Je peux facilement les enregistrer et les tagger avec un simple clique droit. Cela rend beaucoup plus facile ma tache de documentation et d'argumentation dans les discussions.»

Damien Soudant : project manager chez JFX finance

« DASHUB m'est devenu totalement indispensable dès la première utilisation. J'ai besoin de me documenter régulièrement dans mon métier et dashub me permet de ranger, classer et filtrer toute la documentation que je trouve en deux clics. Le système de tags est très bien pensé, l’intégration à mon navigateur est super pratique et me permet une utilisation rapide. DASHUB est simple, intuitif et efficace! Qu'importe où je suis, je ne perd plus les recherches précieuses que je fais, un gain de temps considérable et ma foi, très confortable. »

► Pourquoi ais-je besoin de fonds?

Jusqu'à maintenant j'ai tout financé avec mon épargne. Le produit est aujourd'hui développé. J'ai besoin de votre aide pour les étapes suivantes:

  • Créer une entreprise pour commencer à vendre DASHUB;
  • Améliorer la version mobile, créer des applications pouvant être facilement trouvées sur l' Apple store et Android market;
  • Travailler avec un designer professionnel de l'ergonomie (UX designer) pour améliorer l'expérience utilisateur. DASHUB sera plus facile à utiliser et certainement plus beau;
  • Ajouter des nouvelles langues, je voudrais traduire DASHUB dans différentes langues ainsi tout le monde pourrait l'utiliser dans sa langue maternelle.


► Que recevez-vous en échange?



Personal account $25

Vous avez un compte personnel de 2 ans à la moitié du prix. Vous m'aidez vraiment. A vrai dire sans votre contribution, qui forme la colonne vertébrale de ce financement, rien ne serait possible.

  • 1 utilisateur;
  • 6GB de capacité de stockage;
  • 80 flux d'importation;
  • Sauvegarde quotidienne.

Contribuez maintenant


Business lifetime $100 [Stock limité]

Idéal pour les professionnels travaillant avec un nombre restreint de partenaires ou collègues.

  • 5 utilisateurs;
  • 15GB de stockage;
  • 200 flux d'importation;
  • Sauvegarde incrémentale quotidienne;
  • Member du programme VIP recherche & développement (voir ci-dessous).

Contribuez maintenant


Corporate lifetime $750 [stock limité]

Conseillez pour toute entreprise désirant avoir la sécurité et la flexibilité d'une solution corporate adaptée à tous leurs besoins.

  • 100 utilisateurs;
  • 100 GB de stockage;
  • Nombre illimité de flux d'importation;
  • Formation en ligne;
  • Sauvegarde incrémentale quotidienne;
  • Member du programme VIP recherche & développement (voir ci-dessous).

Contribuez maintenant


Gold lifetime $5000 [stock limité]

La solution sans souci. Pratiquement aucune limite, une formation de votre équipe, vous vous focalisez sur votre métier, nous nous occupons de la maintenance de l'outil.

  • 100 utilisateurs;
  • 200 GB de stockage;
  • Nombre illimité de flux d'importation;
  • Formation en ligne ou formation dans votre bureau*;
  • Member du programme VIP recherche & développement (voir ci-dessous).

* Le trajet and et les frais d'hébergement ne doivent pas excéder $1000 depuis notre localisation?


Contribuez maintenant


DASHUB Blade Server $11000 [stock limité]

La solution idéale pour les organisations désirant conservées un maximum de confidentialité et de flexibilité.


  • Nombre illimité d'utilisateurs;
  • Nombre illimité de flux d'importation;
  • Système RAID;
  • Instruction pour l'intégrer rapidement dans votre réseau;
  • RAID system;
  • Matériel certifié Linux (redhat);
  • OS: Ubuntu Server;
  • Demandez-nous d'avantage de détails sur cette offre.

Contribuez maintenant


Programme VIP de recherche & développement.

Voulez-vous influencer l'évolution de ce produit? Donnez votre point de vue sur les développements à venir? Voter pour la meilleure fonctionnalité? Proposez vos propres idées? Testez nos prototypes? Donnez votre opinion sur le design, l'ergonomie? Bienvenu(e) dans notre programme VIP! On a besoin d'une solide base pour les deux ans à venir. Rejoignez-nous! Veuillez notez qu'un document garantissant une certaine confidentialité vous sera demandé pour vous permettre d'accéder au coeur de notre activité.



► Avantages concurrentiels

  • Une plateforme unique pour vos besoins en : organisation de l'information,veille et partage. You can find these functionalities but on different platforms. Simplify your life.
  • DASHUB est natif du web, il respecte les standards. Cela permet déjà des choses impressionnantes comme l'intéraction avec des objets 3D (en anglais) y compris sur appareils mobiles. Choisissez une solution pour les années à venir, ne tombez pas dans le piège des technologies propriétaires.
  • Multi-utilisateur depuis le noyau. DASHUB a été d'abord développé pour le monde professionnel et ensuite adapté pour le grand public. . Il est compatible avec l'organisation d'une entreprise. (gestion des utilisateurs, gestion des droits par dossier, etc.)



► Quand livrons-nous


SPANISH VERSION


Enfoca organiza y comparte fácilmente todo tu contenido multimedia, paginas web, links en redes sociales, emails y documentos desde un solo lugar en la nube.

► Que es Dashub?

El internet se esta convirtiendo en tu escritorio. Como deberías respaldar tus archivos? Como esperas seguir la pista de tanta gente interesante en las redes sociales? Quieres ser notificado cuando una de tus fuentes hable sobre tus temas favoritos? Necesitas que todo este enfocado y que valga la pena tenerlo en un solo lugar? Como puedes encontrar lo que necesitas cuando lo necesitas?
Hasta ahora, no había ninguna herramienta que te ayudara a guardar links de YouTube y mezclarlos con interesantes fotos en Pinterest o con un artículo en un blog. Ninguna herramienta para organizar tus emails, tus .PDF y todo lo que encuentras interesante en la web en carpetas exclusivas.

Ahora Dashub puede hacerlo!

Dashub es una aplicación web que puede ser enlazada a tu navegador, Buzón de email, o Dropbox. Funciona en tu computadora, en tu Tablet, e incluso en tu Smartphone.

  • Puedes guardar todo lo que quieras en la web (paginas, videos, tweets, post en facebook, etc).
  • Puedes conectar tu cuenta de correo y Dropbox para guardar archivos y emails importantes en Dashub.
  • Puedes organizar todo con tags y en carpetas.
  • Puedes continuamente monitorear fuentes de información. Las fuentes pueden ser usuarios específicos en Facebook, usuarios en Twitter, o sitios web, definidos por tus temas y tener notificaciones cuando alguien esta hablando de ellos.





► Compatibilidad

Dashub es totalmente compatible con cualquier dispositivo que soporte el HTML estándar actual. Funciona bien en:

  • Google Chrome (Windows, MacOS, Linux, o Android)
  • Firefox (Windows, MacOS, o Linux)
  • Safari (MacOS, o iOS)
  • Internet explorer 10 o superior)

Dashub es compatible con dispositivos móviles como:

  • Android (Tablet y Smartphone)
  • iOS (iPad, o iPhone)
  • Windows Mobile/ Windows 8



►Testimonios

Johanna Viejo : Director de Netoptic S.A.

Cuales son los beneficios de Dashub a nuestro equipo de diseño?
  • Toda nuestra inspiración en cualquier formato en un solo lugar.
  • Una forma fácil rápida y eficiente para compartir nuestros archivos dinámicamente, incluso de forma remota.
  • Una visión y sensación de que puedes tener un análisis a primera vista.
  • Muy eficiente servicio técnico.
Dashub es la herramienta ideal para nuestro equipo creativo. Nos permite archivar nuestras inspiraciones de cualquier fuente, para organizarla, o de vizualizarla de una forma practica y eficiente. Una verdadera ayuda para la creatividad.

Laurent Munster : Project Manager at Banque Privée Edmond de Rothschild Europe S.A.

Recientemente utilice Dashub para agrupar la información de un viaje familiar a Guadeloupe. Gracias a Dashub no tuve la necesidad de imprimir todo y llevarlo conmigo. Continuamente tuve a la mano mis emails de confirmación para los vuelos, los contactos para la renta de la villa y de la renta de el coche, acceso a mapas, y también links con recomendaciones para excursiones, restaurantes, caminatas, y sitios para visitar. Incluso digitalizé nuestros pasaportes. Sin preocupaciones, con Dashub, todo estaba organizado atraves de simples tags y a un solo click.

Claudine Fraiture : Director General en North Atlantic Consult S.A.

Tengo 70 años y sigo activo como consultante; me informo diariamente en temas específicos relacionados con mi negocio. Recolecto información de periódicos, blogs y diferentes sitios especializados atraves de notificaciones seleccionadas. Algunos artículos vale la pena guardarlos, quiero leerlos en diferentes ocaciones: que debería hacer? Todo debería ser simple para mi, de verdad simple, rápido y fácil de archivar y encontrar; mi pereza y experiencia ambos han sido seducidos por Dashub: un click en el búho y un cuadro de dialogo aparece, simple y eficiente, un solo campo para poner el tema y los tags y esta listo, puedo hacer otra cosa!

Benjamin Damien : Freelance Profesional en Biotecnología

Dashub me ayuda a seguir la pista a el torrente de información que encuentro cada día en mis temas favoritos ciencia y economía y de fácilmente grabarlos y taggear con un simple click. Hace que las tareas de documentar y participar en discusiones mucho mas fácil de conseguir.

Damien Soudant : administrador de proyectos en JFX Finanzas

Necesito documentarme a mi mismo regularmente en mi sector y Dashub me permite guardar, organizar y filtrar toda la documentación que encuentro con solo 2 clicks. Es sistema de tageo esta muy bien pensado, la integracion con mi navegador es extremadamente practica, y es rápida de usar. Dashub es simple, amigable con el usuario y eficiente! No importa donde este, nunca pierdo mis preciadas búsquedas, un significativo ahorro de tiempo.

story_txt:
Français  
español

► What is DASHUB?


The Internet is becoming your desktop. How should you save your digital files ?  How can you hope to  keep track of all the many interesting people in social networks? Do you want to be notified when one of your sources talks about one of your favorite  topics? Do you need to centralize everything worth keeping in a single place? How can you easily retrieve  what you need just when you need it?Up to now, there has been no single tool to help you store video clips found on YouTube and to merge them with interesting pictures found on Pinterest or with an article on a blog.  No one tool  to easily organize your emails, your .pdf files, and all your other online findings into dedicated folders.Now DASHUB can do it!DASHUB is a web application that can be connected to your web browser, mailbox, or Dropbox account. It works on your computer, on your tablet, and even on your smart phone.

You can save anything you want on the web (pages, video, tweets, Facebook posts, etc).
You can connect your mailbox and Dropbox and save  important files or emails to DASHUB.

You can organize  all of them by tags and by folders. 

You can easily continuously monitor sources of information. The source can be specific users on Facebook, specific people  on Twitter, or specific web sites. Defined your topics, and be notified when someone is talking about them.





















► CompatibilityDASHUB is fully responsive. It  can work on any device supporting the standard HTML of today. It works well on:
 Chrome (Windows, MacOS, Linux, Android)

 Firefox (Windows, MacOS, Linux)

 Safari (MacOS, iOS)

 Internet explorer 10 and above (windows)


DASHUB is compatible with mobile devices such as:

 Android (tablet & smartphone)

 iOS (iPad, iPhone)

 Winfows 8 (Windows surface included).

► Testimonials
Johanna Viejo : director at Netoptic SA
«What are the benefits of DASHUB for our design team?:

 All our inspirations in any formats in a single place.

 Easy, fast & efficient way to share dynamically our data, even remotely.

 A look & feel allowing an analysis at first sight.

 Very efficient technical support.


DASHUB is an ideal tool for a creative team. It allows us to archive our inspirations from any sources, to organize them, and to visualize them in a practical and efficient way. A real support for creativity.»

Laurent Munster : project Manager at Banque Privée Edmond de Rothschild Europe S.A.« I have recently used DASHUB to group the information about a family trip to Guadeloupe. Thank to DASHUB, I had no need any more to print everything and to take it with me. I continually had at hand y my confirmation emails for our flights, the contacts for the villa renting, and the car renting, an access map, and   also links to recommended excursions, restaurants, walks, and locations to visit. I even scanned our passports. No worries, with DASHUB, everything was organized through extremely simple tags accessible in a single click. »
Claudine Fraiture : general Director at North Atlantic Consult SA 
«  I'm 70 ans and I'm still active as a consultant; I inform myself on a daily basis on topics closed to my business. I gather my information from newspapers, blogs and different specialized web sites and through targeted notifications.

Some articles are worth keeping, I want to be able to read them on different occasions: what should I do?

Everything must be simple for me, really simple, fast and easy to index and to retrieve ; my laziness and my experience have been both seduced by DASHUB: a single click on the owl, a dialog box appears, simple and efficient. A single field to fill with the topics and its tags and it is done, I can move to something else ! 
» 
Benjamin Damien : freelance Biotechnology Professional
« DASHUB helps me to keep track of the torrent of information I'm encountering every day in my favorite topics in science and economics, and to easily record  and tag them with a simple right-click. It makes the tasks of documenting and participating  in discussions a much easier achievement. »
Damien Soudant : project manager at JFX finance
« I need to document myself regularly on my sector and DASHUB allows me to store, organize, and filter all the documentation that I found with just two clicks.  The tags system is very well thought out, the integration to my web browser is extremely practical, and it is quick to use. DASHUB is simple, user-friendly, and efficient! Wherever I am, I never lose my precious research, a significant saving in time. »

► Why do I need funds
So far I have funded DASHUB out of my savings. . The product is already fully developed. I need your help for the next steps:
Forming a company to start selling DASHUB.
Enhancing the mobile versions, creating apps that could be easily found on the different mobile markets for Apple iOS and Android..
Working with a UX designer to improve the user experience, so that DASHUB would look easier to use and probably prettier.

New languages, I would like to translate DASHUB into different languages so people all around the world could use it.

► Qu'est ce que DASHUB?
Comment organiser votre vie digitale? Comment garder une trace des personnes intéressantes dans les réseaux sociaux? Etre notifié quand une de vos sources parle d'un sujet qui vous intéresse particulièrement? Centraliser tout ce qui est intéressant (email, liens, document, videos, images) dans une seule place? Les classer en un seul clic et les retrouver facilement quand vous en avez besoin?
DASHUB le fait.
DASHUB est une application web. Elle peut être connectée à votre navigateur web, à votre email ou à Dropbox. Elle fonctionne sur votre ordinateur, votre tablette ou votre smartphone.

Sauvez tout ce que vous voulez sur le web (pages, video clips, tweets, posts facebook, etc).

Connectez votre email, votre dropbox and sauvez y les emails ou fichiers importants.
Organisez le tout avec des tags et dans des dossiers.
Mettez en place des vieilles sur des sources d'information. Cette source peut être un ou des utilisateurs facebook ou twitter  spécifiques, Ces sources peuvent être aussi des sites web. Définissez l'objet de la veille par l'intermédiaire de mots-clé et soyez notifié dès qu'ils l'abordent.



















► Compatibilité
DASHUB est totalement "responsive". Ce qui veut dire qu'il peut fonctionner sur n'importe quel appareil respectant les standards HTML d'aujourd'hui. Pratiquement, ils fonctionnent sur:

 Chrome (Windows, MacOS, Linux, Android);
 Firefox (Windows, MacOS, Linux);
 Safari( MacOS, iOS);
 Internet explorer 10 et supérieur (windows).

DASHUB est compatible avec les appareils suivants 


Android (tablette et smartphone) 


iOS (iPad et iPhone) 


Windows 8 (Surface y compris).

Dashub es una aplicación web que puede ser enlazada a tu navegador, Buzón de email, o Dropbox. Funciona en tu computadora, en tu Tablet, e incluso en tu Smartphone.

story:
Ladies & Gentlemen:

We all Dream, Hope, Pray and work hard to succeed ,and once we succeed, it does not seem to be everything we had hoped. 


This is exactly how we felt, so we decided to change direction and do something different; something that would make a difference and would also give us a sense of purpose and fulfillment. 

We would like to take this opportunity to introduce you to "Natural Crete"

"Natural Crete" is the Manufacturer of one of the world's finest products for Road Stabilization. “Natural Crete” is a unique, soil-stabilizing product with the potential to significantly reduce the overall cost for road construction by as much as 50%.

With Minimal Maintenance, well Engineered “Natural Crete” Roads, with the appropriate finished pavements, are known to last 20 + years.

“Natural Crete” increases the load-bearing capacity of the soil and reduces the plasticity and permeability.

The result is a durable and water-resistant mix, that can be used in any climatic environment, as a sub base.

Typically, the bonding process will be sufficiently cured within 72 hours to permit a road's use, by normal slow moving traffic, even before a Surface Finish/Pavement is installed. 

"Natural Crete" is 100% Natural and Environmentally Safe

For more detailed information please visit our website: www.naturalcrete.com

“Natural Crete” Roads have the capacity to change lives in so many ways:

1. Help Farmers bring their produce to Market before it rots

2. Help provide easier access from outlying rural areas to Hospitals

3. Help provide Children access to Schools

4. Help small home grown rural industry, get access to local markets and to ports , to ship their products to additional markets world wide.

5. Help people get access to Medicine, Education & basic necessities.

6. Help provide access to Police, Ambulance, Fire prevention.

7.  Help make Emergency evacuation easier.

We have all heard: 

It is better to teach someone to fish, rather then giving them the fish.   The fish you give them, will feed them for just one day.                      Teaching them how to fish, will feed them for a Lifetime.

Your Contribution will Help Change Lives

story:
Dear Karate Nerd,

It's Jesse here.

Today, I have something exciting to tell you.

For the first time ever, I'm hosting a unique seminar.

And you are officially invited to participate.

The Karate Nerd Experience 2014 is an international seminar & training camp for 36 dedicated people, where we'll eat, sleep, breathe and train Karate together on August 1-3 in Frankfurt, Germany.

But...

This isn't your "usual" seminar.

Oh no.

The purpose of the seminar is laser-focused:

Take your Karate to the next level.

Together with me, multiple-times Italian, European and World Champion Dr. Lucio Maurino (Level IV Olympic Coach & Sports Scientist) plus a secret guest, you'll be exposed to unique training methods, principles & concepts with the sole purpose of delivering blinding flashes of knowledge in order to elevate your current level of Karate.

The theme of the seminar is "On Ko Chi Shin".

("Learn From the Old to Understand the New".)

Why?

Because - to boost your Karate optimally we need to combine modern, scientific Karate principles with old-school, original Karate concepts.

And that's *exactly* what we'll be doing.

You see...

I've been to hundreds of Karate camps in my life. All over the world. Sadly, only a handful of those were memorable experiences. Often, I wasted both time and money on "grandmasters" or champions who didn't inspire or improve me at all.

  • But I learned. 
  • I took notes. 
  • And I did a LOT of research.

So believe me when I say this:

KNX14 will be unlike any other seminar you've ever attended.

(Otherwise, what's the point?)

  • We will NOT be doing five hundred sit-ups.
  • We will NOT be doing two hundred punches in horse stance.
  • And no - we will definitely  NOT be doing meaningless choreography ("kata"), just so you can forget it the next day.

(However, on the last day I will introduce a kata I learned in Okinawa from a previously secret family-style of Karate.)

So listen up:

If you're a Karate Nerd who loves experiencing new things, improve your Karate, kick ass & have fun - this is for YOU.

We will live together (single & double rooms, breakfast buffet included), train Karate together (explore modern scientific principles & ancient Okinawan Karate concepts) and last but not least - have tons of fun together!

All you have to do is get your ticket and come to Frankfurt.

But hurry - there are only 36 spots available!

"Sounds great! How can I attend?"

Check the right side of this page - choose single ticket or double ticket. 

That's it!

(Plan B: If you cannot attend in person, click the "KNX14 HQ Video" option. I will have a camera man film the seminar and send it to you. Very different from attending live, but it's the next best thing. Participants of the seminar will of course receive both photos, videos and notes for free.)

Note: If I don't reach the funding goal  (€8184), the seminar will not happen. This is the budget required to prepay the sports facility (accomodation, food, dojo/gym rent), training, material, transfers and flights for all instructors.

When the tickets are sold out, I will let you know the exact address of the location, what to bring, where to meet, how to get there, more secret info etc.

Questions?  Let me know.

Trust me to make this seminar awesome for you!

Welcome to The Karate Nerd Experience 2014.

You DON'T want to miss this opportunity...

See you in August!  ;)


PS. Here's where we'll be - just 5 minutes from Frankfurt airport:


Proudly sponsored by  


By registering you approve the General Terms.

story: We are hosting our 3rd annual Toys for Tot's fundraiser! Last year we wee able to raise $3000! We'd like to do even better this year. We are hosting a 2 day concert event in Omaha to fundraise. So with that we are running this online campaign to involve all of those that are not able to attend the event. Every little bit helps. We are asking that everyone try to find it in thier hearts and in their budget to make a donation. Even if it's only $1. If we all can give a little, together we can accomplish something amazing! Please share this link on your social media pages as well. This will help spread the word. For all of you that help this year and have helped in past years we can't thank you enough! 100% of all funds raised will be donated. This is completely non profit. Thank you! If you'd like more information please ask me, Dean Whitman. You can email me at ddfwhitman@gmail.com
